author: Rachel Babbage
title: James Corden describes getting his OBE to Stephen Colbert - Showbiz
text: James Corden has wowed Stephen Colbert with his British royal connections during an appearance on The Late Show.He told his fellow host on Friday's show about the time he collected his OBE (Officer of the British Empire), describing Buckingham Palace as "not too shabby" (via EW).Corden said to Colbert: "There's less pictures of the Queen in Buckingham Palace than you have of your own face in your studio."Colbert replied the closest similar situation in the States to picking up such an honour would be "Obama retweets you." Â© CBS When asked how he came to be honoured, Corden said he "had no idea" but it was probably for being "a professional dick for a bit of his life".The Late Show host proceeded to ask Corden if he's ever used his medal to get out of a sticky situation. Find out how Corden responded in the video above.
